products.title: Sugar White Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The soft white colour of the sugar white aluminium venetian blind is perfect for those who don't want a bright, glossy white slat in their window, but are after something less stark and a little bit warmer. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Warm White Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Vista, Basic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: For all of the cool, with less of the colour, choose the vista in basic white, a sturdy blind made from heavy gauge aluminium, fully adjustable using the pull-cords so that you can allow more or less light in with ease. Made with perforated slats to let the light gently filter through when open or closed, creating a soft atmosphere. Industrialise your home office, where all the work gets done, by settling the basic white amongst functional white furniture and brushed silver fittings.

products.title: Santiago Blackout Snow White  Roller Blind
products.description: This santiago blackout snow white roller blind takes simplicity and makes it stylish. The crisp white fabric is a classic choice for window dressing, as versatile as can be and bringing that timeless, crisp brightness that every space loves. products.title: Essence Silver Frost Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat

products.title: Essence Milky White Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
products.description: Milky, creamy, however you want to name it, this light off-white venetian blind is a happy medium between bright and inviting, neutral and warm. The milky colour takes the edge off so you dont get any glare but still keeps your home looking spacious and open. Plus, with it bein milky, creamy, however you want to name it, this light off-white venetian blind is a happy medium between bright and inviting, neutral and warm.

products.title: Robin N' Frost Roller Blind
products.description: The icy blue colour of the robin n frost roller is perfect for adding a cooler tone to your room - with the icy blue backing and the white print overlaying it makes this blind unique and cool - in more ways than one. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Speciality White Crane Roller Blind
products.description: A strong and bold pattern, the speciality white crane is great for decor's that require a bold repeating pattern that won't dominate the room because of its colour.
